metadata.dc:description: The hematological disorders are frequent in HIV infection; however the hemolytic anemia is a rare complication in pediatric patients. At this moment exist less than ten cases reported in medical literature. The authors reported a four month old girl with perinatal docu-mented infection by HIV associated to autoimmune hemolytic anemia, and they propose a critic route for diagnosis and initial treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Anemia hemolítica autoinmune e infección perinatal por VIH. Informe de un caso y revisión de la literatura.
[Hemolytic autoimmune anemia and perinatal HIV infection. A case report and brief review].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista medica del Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social
